snippet: “The Enchanted Island,” a pastiche incorporating elements from Shakespeare and Baroque works by Handel, Vivaldi and others, had its premiere Saturday at the Metropolitan Opera.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews Metropolitan Opera production of opera The Enchanted Island, a pastiche of works by several classical music composers, starring Placido Domingo.
lead_paragraph: “The Enchanted Island,” a pastiche incorporating elements from Shakespeare and Baroque works by Handel, Vivaldi and others, had its premiere Saturday at the Metropolitan Opera.

headline.seo: ‘The Enchanted Island’ at the Metropolitan Opera - Review
headline.main: Shiny Bibelot From Shakespeare, Handel & Co.
headline.print_headline: Shiny Bibelot From Shakespeare, Handel & Co.
